creditline: Gift of Raymond A. and Ruth A. Reister
description: drum shaped box on birch bark body; flat top decorated with floral rondel and basket weave-like border in white quills; central element in flower made of small bits of red quills; one band around edge of cover and one band around body of box with alternating X-motifs and basket weave diamonds with white quills
medium: Plant fibers, birch bark, porcupine quills
title: Box with floral motif on cover
